question: What do I have?
question_content:
I woke up yesterday morning with a sore throat, I got a culture done and i don't have strep, later that day i got a headache and lost my appetite, today i am fatigued have a headache (tylenol sometimes works)somewhat of an earache and some light muscle soreness+fever

What can be done to make me comfortable? I am taking tylenol and drinking fluids

answers.answer_content: Sounds like influenza. Rest, sleep, tylenol and fluids (as you are doing).  Mostly tea, water, juice.  Keep eating what you can - soda crackers, pretzels, toast, even if you don't feel like it so your body can get strong again.

That sounds similar to a virus I had a couple of weeks ago.  The ear ache, sore throat and headache may all be related to sinus drainage/infection.  The muscle soreness and fatigue are probably side effects of the fever.  It took about 10 days for me to get past what I had.

You can alternate between Tylenol and ibuprofen; take one then take the other two hours later, alternating back and forth between the two in two hour intervals.  

The ear ache is probably your best indicator as to whether you are getting better or worse.  If it lasts more than a couple of days or becomes unbearable, then you should see a doctor and get a prescription for it.  Otherwise, like most viruses, it will just have to run its course.

My Fiance has the same thing and has for a couple of days now and had a fever of 101 and he has been drinking lots of fluids, napping alot, eating soup and taking Benylin pills for cold and flu it works wonders and he feels much better today. Also he sat in a warm bath and layed down after and watched a movie and said he felt better you just have to relax. Hope this helped and hope you feel better!!!! :)

probably just a virus give it a week to ten days and you should be back to normal if you see that you have big headaches and a stiff neck with temperature go back to the doctors as soon as possible and get retested  for strep or menengites some times the test come back false wen they are positive so if it continues after a week get retested

the flu, everyone I know has had, including me,  if it's the same one wait until you can't get out of bed without passing out. it's really bad this year, everyone at work has missed 2 or more weeks over it and several schools in my area have closed down because of it. so just stay in bed drink liquids and take medicine.  good luck.

Throw away tylenol and crap like that.
Eat organic garlic and onions more often. Get raw honey and drink hot herbal tea with it.

take some sinus and cold medicine and gargle with salt water as warm as you can stand it several times a day take ur antibiotics till thier gone, use lysol spray on all surfaces to keep from spreading it good luck

sounds like the flu.... amy over the counter flu meds will work, i use aleve cold and flu and it works awesome.  Other than that plenty of extra fluids and lotsa lotsa rest.  hope you feel better soon.
turn up your electric blanket, get some tea and lemon, hot, and stay in bed honey, ya got the flu,lasts about 1 -2 weeks don't worry, mama loves ya!
It sounds like  a hang over. go drink a fifth of something and hand full of pain killers and go have some fun.
